seed_pair.known: Conozco a ese hombre joven que está sentado allí.
seed_pair.target: I know that young man who's sitting over there.

S0297: No conozco a muchas personas que hablan español.
I don't know many people who speak Spanish.
S0298: No me queda nada que decir.
I've got nothing left to say.
S0300: She doesn't want to seem unfriendly.
S0301: Él dijo que quiere mostrarte algo.
He said that he wants to show you something.
S0302: Ella dijo que no quiere vivir en una ciudad.
She said that she doesn't want to live in a city.
S0303: I think that he wants to sit down.
S0304: Creo que ella no quiere trabajar desde casa.
I think that she doesn't want to work from home.
S0306: Conozco a esa mujer joven que está hablando con tu amigo.
I know that young woman who's talking to your friend.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs sentences as natural language pattern examples
_instructions.lego_coverage_requirement: Practice phrases MUST use at least 60% of the LEGOs listed in recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1]
_instructions.vocabulary_source: Prioritize LEGOs from recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1] + current_seed_legos_available, then any words from sentences
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
